scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.copy:dist: cp -R server/dist .temp/app && cp server/package.json server/package-lock.json .temp/app && cp -R client/dist .temp/app/public && cp -R codedeploy/* .temp/ && cp server_start.sh .temp/
scripts.create: npm run build && npm run create:dir && npm run copy:dist && npm run zip:dist
scripts.upload: npm run create && npm run upload:current
